Breathing_478.title: 4-7-8 Breathing
steps: 2. Close your mouth and inhale quietly through your nose for a count of 4.
3. Hold your breath for a count of 7.
4. Exhale completely through your mouth with a whoosh sound for a count of 8.

Grounding_54321.title: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding Technique
steps: 5. Name **1** thing you can **taste** (or wish you could).
This helps bring focus back to the present moment.
